mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM post WHERE id < #{id} AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND del_flag = 0
SELECT * FROM post WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM post WHERE id > #{id} AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AND del_flag = 0
SELECT SUM( page_view ) AS clicks FROM post WHERE del_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) AS posts FROM post WHERE del_flag = 0

SELECT p.id AS pId, p.del_flag AS pDelFlag, p.create_time AS pCreateTime, p.update_time AS pUpdateTime, p.title AS pTitle, p.subtitle AS pSubtitle, p.image AS pImage, p.body AS pBody, p.`timestamp` AS pTimestamp, p.can_comment AS pCanComment, p.category_id AS pCategoryId, p.page_view AS pPageView, c.id AS cId, c.del_flag AS cDelFlag, c.create_time AS cCreateTime, c.update_time AS cUpdateTime, c.NAME AS cName FROM post p LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = p.category_id WHERE p.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0
AND p.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND p.category_id like concat('%',#{categoryId},'%')
ORDER BY p.id DESC

SELECT p.id AS pId, p.del_flag AS pDelFlag, p.create_time AS pCreateTime, p.update_time AS pUpdateTime, p.title AS pTitle, p.subtitle AS pSubtitle, p.image AS pImage, p.body AS pBody, p.`timestamp` AS pTimestamp, p.can_comment AS pCanComment, p.category_id AS pCategoryId, p.page_view AS pPageView, c.id AS cId, c.del_flag AS cDelFlag, c.create_time AS cCreateTime, c.update_time AS cUpdateTime, c.NAME AS cName FROM post p LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = p.category_id where p.id = #{id}
